spinner.label: Default Draw Distance
spinner.name: draw_distance
spinner.tool_tip: Sets the default regional draw distance

check_box.label: Force Draw Distance
check_box.name: force_draw_distance
check_box.tool_tip: If this box is checked, draw distance will be locked for all people in the region. Note: This will lag people on older machines. (Default: Off)

spinner.label: Max Drag Distance
spinner.name: max_drag_distance
spinner.tool_tip: Sets the maximum distance a prim can be dragged in this region

spinner.label: Max Prim Scale
spinner.name: max_prim_scale
spinner.tool_tip: Sets the maximum size a prim can be made in this region

spinner.label: Min Prim Scale
spinner.name: min_prim_scale
spinner.tool_tip: Sets the minumum size a prim can be made in this region

spinner.label: Max Physical Prim Scale
spinner.name: max_phys_prim_scale
spinner.tool_tip: Sets the maximum size a physical prim can be made in this region

spinner.label: Max Hollow Size
spinner.name: max_hollow_size
spinner.tool_tip: Sets the maximum size a hole can be made in a prim created in this region

spinner.label: Min Hole Size
spinner.name: min_hole_size
spinner.tool_tip: Sets the minimum size a hole can be made in a prim created in this region

spinner.label: Max Link Count
spinner.name: max_link_count
spinner.tool_tip: Sets the maximum amount of objects that can be linked in a non-physical linkset for the region

spinner.label: Max Link Count Phys
spinner.name: max_link_count_phys
spinner.tool_tip: Sets the maximum amount of objects that can be linked in a physical linkset for the region

spinner.label: Max Inventory Items To Transfer
spinner.name: max_inventory_items_transfer
spinner.tool_tip: This box controls how many objects can be transfered between clients at a time. -1 sets no limit on the amount of objects. (Default: -1)

spinner.label: Terrain Detail Scale
spinner.name: terrain_detail_scale
spinner.tool_tip: Sets the region's terrain detail scale

spinner.label: Show Tags
spinner.name: show_tags
spinner.tool_tip: This box controls how avatar name tags are shown in this sim. 2 sets tags to always be shown. 1 sets tags to disappear after some time. 0 blocks the viewing of name tags.

spinner.label: Max Groups
spinner.name: max_groups
spinner.tool_tip: This box controls how many groups an agent can join. -1 sets no limit on the amount of groups. (Default: -1)

check_box.label: Render Water
check_box.name: render_water
check_box.tool_tip: If this box is checked, water will not be shown for users in the region. (Default: Off)

check_box.label: Allow Minimap
check_box.name: allow_minimap
check_box.tool_tip: If this box is checked, the minimap will be disabled for users in the region. (Default: Off)

check_box.label: Allow Physical Prims
check_box.name: allow_physical_prims
check_box.tool_tip: If this box is checked, physical prims may not be created in the region. (Default: On)

check_box.label: Enforce Max Build Constraints
check_box.name: enforce_max_build
check_box.tool_tip: If this box is checked, the region will enforce maximum build constraints. (Default: On)

check_box.label: Allow Parcel WindLight
check_box.name: allow_parcel_windlight
check_box.tool_tip: If this box is checked, setting WindLight settings in parcels will be enabled. (Default: On)
